author: stas
msg: update the follow redirect behavior with POSTs doc

author: stas
msg: TestConfigC is in the same package as TestConfig, so don't redeclare WIN32

author: joes
msg: perl build/version_check.pl --version=2.XX generates a META.yml file for CPAN, which will be incorporated into future releases.
perl build/version_check.pl generates a nicer prerequisite list, with sections that show how the prereqs relate to the build type.
Apache::Test is no longer a requirement for the C API (although the env/ tests will not run during % make test).
